name: time_entry_id
description: Unique identifier for the time entry record.

name: employee_id
description: ID of the employee who logged the time entry.

name: business_id
description: ID of the client company the employee works for.

name: clock_in
description: Timestamp when the employee clocked in.

name: clock_out
description: Timestamp when the employee clocked out.

name: break_minutes
description: Total break time (in minutes) deducted from work hours.

name: total_hours_worked
description: Total hours worked after deducting break time.

name: pay_period
description: Pay period associated with the time entry (e.g., '2025-03-01 to 2025-03-15').

name: overtime_reason
description: Reason for overtime (if required by the employer).

name: notes
description: Additional notes related to the time entry.

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the time entry was added.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when the time entry was last updated.
